SEARCH
Package com.cy_siao.model

Class Stay

java.lang.Object
com.cy_siao.model.Stay
public class Stay extends Object
Represents a stay in a bed by a person for a specific time period. Manages the relationship between beds, persons and stay dates.

    • modifyDates

      public boolean modifyDates(LocalDate newArrival, LocalDate newDeparture)
      Attempts to modify the arrival and departure dates. Only allows modifications if new dates are not in the past.
      Parameters:
      newArrival - The new arrival date
      newDeparture - The new departure date
      Returns:
      true if dates were modified successfully, false otherwise

    • isActiveToday

      public boolean isActiveToday()
      Checks if the stay is currently active (today falls between arrival and departure dates).
      Returns:
      true if stay is active, false otherwise

    • isEditable

      public boolean isEditable()
      Checks if the stay can be edited (hasn't started yet).
      Returns:
      true if stay can be edited, false if stay has already begun

    • isInconsistent

      public boolean isInconsistent()
      Check if the person respect his stay
      Returns:
      true if the person stay more day than is stay
